description:
The Emoji Box contains a a selection of emojis which can be used to customise the appearance of your character in Portal Knights including:

- Angry Emoji
- Grin Emoji
- Hehe Emoji
- Kiss Emoji
- Lol Emoji
- Love Emoji
- Sad Emoji
- Smiley Emoji
- Surprised Emoji
- Wink Emoji

Access your emoji gift box from the in-game shop in Portal Knights.

The world of Elysia needs YOU! Join this cooperative, 3D sandbox action RPG to level up your character, craft epic weapons, conquer enemies in real-time, and build almost anything! Craft your adventure. Forge your hero. Become the ultimate Portal Knight!
name: Portal Knights - Emoji Box
